episodes.title: What Jim Jones' Son Said About Surviving the Jonestown Massacre | Lawrence Wright
episodes.description:
🕊️💔 What was it like to survive one of the deadliest cult tragedies in history? In this powerful episode, journalist and author Lawrence Wright shares the gripping testimony of Jim Jones' son, Stephan Jones, who survived the infamous Jonestown Massacre that claimed over 900 lives in 1978. From his harrowing escape to the emotional aftermath, this story offers a rare, first-person glimpse into the mind of a cult leader’s child—and the trauma of living through mass manipulation, fear, and survival.

🔍 Inside this episode:
✅ Stephan Jones’ perspective on his father’s transformation into a cult leader
✅ How he survived the massacre while others—including his family—did not
✅ The emotional cost of losing nearly everyone he knew overnight
✅ Reflections on forgiveness, guilt, and life after Jonestown

⚠️ This is not just history—it’s a haunting lesson on control, belief, and human resilience.

📢 Subscribe for more untold stories, survivor testimony, and deep dives into cult psychology and historical truth.: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQ_piSR8gm-TfHZcDWOJciA?sub_confirmation=1
